item.dc:creator: aivah_system32
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my blog. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickies to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Reservation
item.dc:creator: aivahthemes
item.content:encoded: [note title="Important!"]Make sure you enter your valid email ID to test the Booking Reservation Mail Format. The Reservation Form emails the booking status for confirmation.[/note] [divider_line]

item.title: Admin Options
item.dc:creator: aivahthemes
item.content:encoded:
Below are the Admin Options for the Victoria Settings

Excluding the below options the theme comes with more alternative options from which you can change the look and feel of the whole theme without having any knowledge in the php or so. Like you can change the layout to full widget layout and assign the sidebars to different positioning and use custom sidebars, removing slider etc... item.title: Shortcodes
item.dc:creator: aivah_system32
item.content:encoded:
[divider_space]

List Styled Shortcodes

[one_fourth] [list style="disc" color="black"]
  • style = disc
  • style = disc
  • style = disc
[/list] [/one_fourth] [one_fourth] [list style="circle" color="red"]
  • style = circle
  • style = circle
  • style = circle
[/list] [/one_fourth] [one_fourth] [list style="square" color="green"]
  • style = square
  • style = square
  • style = square
[/list] [/one_fourth] [one_fourth_last] [list style="arrow1" color="blue"]
  • style = arrow1
  • style = arrow1
  • style = arrow1
[/list] [/one_fourth_last] [divider_space] [one_fourth] [list style="arrow2" color="cyan"]
  • style = arrow2
  • style = arrow2
  • style = arrow2
[/list] [/one_fourth] [one_fourth] [list style="arrow3" color="navy"]
  • style = arrow3
  • style = arrow3
  • style = arrow3
[/list] [/one_fourth] [one_fourth] [list style="arrow4" color="pink"]
  • style = arrow4
  • style = arrow4
  • style = arrow4
[/list] [/one_fourth] [one_fourth_last] [list style="arrow5" color="yellow"]
  • style = arrow5
  • style = arrow5
  • style = arrow5
[/list] [/one_fourth_last] [divider_space] [one_fourth] [list style="bullet1" color="orange"]
  • style = bullet1
  • style = bullet1
  • style = bullet1
[/list] [/one_fourth] [one_fourth] [list style="bullet2" color="magenta"]
  • style = bullet2
  • style = bullet2
  • style = bullet2
[/list] [/one_fourth] [one_fourth] [list style="bullet3" color="black"]
  • style = bullet3
  • style = bullet3
  • style = bullet3
[/list] [/one_fourth] [one_fourth_last] [list style="bullet4" color="red"]
  • style = bullet4
  • style = bullet4
  • style = bullet4
[/list] [/one_fourth_last] [divider_space] [one_fourth] [list style="bullet5" color="green"]
  • style = bullet5
  • style = bullet5
  • style = bullet5
[/list] [/one_fourth] [one_fourth] [list style="star1" color="blue"]
  • style = star1
  • style = star1
  • style = star1
[/list] [/one_fourth] [one_fourth] [list style="star2" color="cyan"]
  • style = star2
  • style = star2
  • style = star2
[/list] [/one_fourth] [one_fourth_last] [list style="star3" color="navy"]
  • style = star3
  • style = star3
  • style = star3
[/list] [/one_fourth_last] [divider_space] [one_fourth] [list style="plus" color="yellow"]
  • style = plus
  • style = plus
  • style = plus
[/list] [/one_fourth] [one_fourth] [list style="minus" color="pink"]
  • style = minus
  • style = minus
  • style = minus
[/list] [/one_fourth] [one_fourth] [list style="pointer" color="orange"]
  • style = pointer
  • style = pointer
  • style = pointer
[/list] [/one_fourth] [one_fourth_last] [list style="style1" color="magenta"]
  • style = style1
  • style = style1
  • style = style1
[/list] [/one_fourth_last] [divider_space] [one_fourth] [list style="check" color="black"]
  • style = check
  • style = check
  • style = check
[/list] [/one_fourth] [one_fourth] [/one_fourth] [one_fourth] [/one_fourth] [one_fourth_last] [/one_fourth_last]// style - Select the style as display above // color - Select the color as display above [list style="star" color="blue"] <ul> <li>style = star</li> <li>style = star</li> <li>style = star</li> </ul> [/list] [divider_top]

Nivo Slider With Post Attachment Shortcode

[postslider effect="random" speed="200" pausetime="5000" limits="5" width="600" height="300" navigation="true"] [postslider effect="random" speed="200" pausetime="5000" limits="5" width="600" height="300" navigation="true"] [divider_top]

Images Shortcode

Parameters
[list style="arrow5 doubles" color="black"]
  • Image URL
  • Image Title
  • Link URL(optional)
  • link Target (optional)
  • lightbox: true,false (optional)
  • align: left,right,center (optional)
  • width (optional)
  • height (optional)
[/list] [divider_line]

Simple image with default size

[image width="450" height="250"]Image URL[/image] [image width="450" height="250" title="Image" lightbox="false" link="#"]http://www.aivahthemes.com/victoria/files/2012/01/9.jpg[/image] [divider_line]

Image with width and height

[image width="600" height="250"]Image URL[/image] [image width="600" height="250" title="Protfolio images 8" lightbox="true"]http://www.aivahthemes.com/victoria/files/2012/01/9.jpg[/image] [divider_line]

Image with lightbox support

[image width="450" height="250" lightbox="true"]Image URL[/image] [image width="450" height="250" title="Image" lightbox="true" link="#"]http://www.aivahthemes.com/victoria/files/2012/01/9.jpg[/image] [divider_line]

Image with Alignment

[image width="450" height="250" align="right"]Image URL[/image] [image width="450" height="250" title="Image" lightbox="false" align="right"]http://www.aivahthemes.com/victoria/files/2012/01/9.jpg[/image] [divider_line]

Image with video

[image width="450" height="250" lightbox="true" link="Video URL"]Image URL[/image] [image width="600" height="250" title="Protfolio images 8" class="image" lightbox="true" link="http://www.vimeo.com/12158329"]http://www.aivahthemes.com/victoria/files/2012/01/9.jpg[/image] [divider_line]

Portfolio Mini Gallery Shortcode

[minigallery class="image" width="200" height="120"]http://www.aivahthemes.com/victoria/files/2012/01/1.jpg http://www.aivahthemes.com/victoria/files/2012/01/2.jpg http://www.aivahthemes.com/victoria/files/2012/01/3.jpg http://www.aivahthemes.com/victoria/files/2012/01/4.jpg http://www.aivahthemes.com/victoria/files/2012/01/5.jpg http://www.aivahthemes.com/victoria/files/2012/01/6.jpg[/minigallery] [divider_space]

How to do?

To achieve a portfolio mini gallery like the one above, use the format below or use Hostme WYSIWYG shortcode popup and select the Images Mini Gallery then insert it to your post or page.

Portfolio Mini Gallery

[list style="check" color="pink"]
  • Width
  • Height
[/list] [images_mini_gallery width="160" height="120"] Insert the full image URL link here Insert the full image URL link here Insert the full image URL link here Insert the full image URL link here Insert the full image URL link here [/images_mini_gallery] [divider_top]

Galleria Shortcode

[galleriaurl width="650" height="350" transition="fadeslide" autoplay="2500"]http://www.aivahthemes.com/victoria/files/2012/01/1.jpg http://www.aivahthemes.com/victoria/files/2012/01/2.jpg http://www.aivahthemes.com/victoria/files/2012/01/3.jpg http://www.aivahthemes.com/victoria/files/2012/01/4.jpg http://www.aivahthemes.com/victoria/files/2012/01/5.jpg http://www.aivahthemes.com/victoria/files/2012/01/6.jpg[/galleriaurl] [galleriaurl width="650" height="350" transition="fadeslide" autoplay="2500"] http://www.aivahthemes.com/victoria/files/2012/01/1.jpg http://www.aivahthemes.com/victoria/files/2012/01/2.jpg http://www.aivahthemes.com/victoria/files/2012/01/3.jpg http://www.aivahthemes.com/victoria/files/2012/01/4.jpg http://www.aivahthemes.com/victoria/files/2012/01/5.jpg http://www.aivahthemes.com/victoria/files/2012/01/6.jpg [/galleriaurl] [divider_top]

Google Charts Shortcode

The Google Charts is extremely simple way to create charts from some data and embed it in a website. The theme provides your Google Chart shortcode that makes the process even easier and lets create few types of charts. It is really simple to post using the shortcode.
Parameters
[divider_line] [list style="check doubles" color="black"]
  • Data
  • Title
  • Labels
  • Size
  • Color
  • Bg Color
  • Type
  • Advance
[/list] [chart data="70,25,20.01,4.99" labels="Wine+Desert|Breakfast|Dinner|Other" colors="058DC7,50B432,ED561B,EDEF00" bg="bg,s" size="630x250" title="Food Chart Title" type="pie2d"] [chart data="70,25,20.01,4.99" labels="Wine+Desert|Breakfast|Dinner|Other" colors="058DC7,50B432,ED561B,EDEF00" bg="bg,s" size="630x250" title="Food Chart Title" type="pie2d"] [divider_top]

Custom Widget Shortcodes

[one_half]

Twitter Widget

With this widget you can pull your latest tweets from twitter account in your Website. See the sample usage below . [list style="check"]
  • count = the number of tweets to display
  • username = the twitter account you would like to pull the tweets from
[/list] // count = the number of tweets to display // username = the twitter account you would like to pull the tweets from [twitter count="4" username="sytem32store"] [/one_half] [one_half_last] [framed_box]

Follows Us

[twitter username="themeflash" limit="3"] [/framed_box] [/one_half_last] [divider_line] [one_half]

Popular Posts

With this widget you can pull your Popular posts and it is calculated amount comments per post. See the sample usage below . [list style="check"]
  • count = the number of post to display
  • thumbnail = {ture or false}
[/list] // count = the number of post to display // thumbnail = {ture or false} [popularpost count="5" thumb="true"] [/one_half] [one_half_last] [framed_box]

Popular Post

[popularpost count="5" thumb="true"] [/framed_box] [/one_half_last] [divider_line] [one_half]

Recent Posts

With this widget you can pull your latest posts anywhere in your page or post or sidebar. See the sample usage below . [list style="check"]
  • count = the number of post to display
  • categories = entre id number
  • thumbnail = {ture or false}
[/list] // count = the number of post to display // categories = entre id number // thumbnail = {ture or false} [recentpost count="5" cat_id="4" thumb="true"] [/one_half] [one_half_last] [framed_box]

Recent Post

[recentpost count="3" cat_id="1" thumb="true"] [/framed_box] [/one_half_last] [divider_line] [one_half]

Contact Information

With this widget you can pull your contact information anywhere in your page or post or sidebar. See the sample usage below . // name = {your name} // address = {your street address} // state = {your state name} // city = {your city name} // zip = {your zip code} // phone = {your phone number} // email = {email address} [contact_info name="John Doe" address="54321 Main Street." state="Victoria 8011 Australia" city="Victoria" zip="PO Box 21177" phone="+61 (0) 3 9023 0074 " email="JohnDoe(at)domain.com"] [/one_half] [one_half_last] [framed_box]

Contact Info

[contactinfo name="John Doe" address="54321 Main Street," state="Victoria 8011 Australia" city="Victoria" zip="PO Box 21177" email="JohnDoe(at)domain.com" phone="+61 (0) 3 9023 0074"] [/framed_box] [/one_half_last] [divider_line] [one_half]

Flickr Photos

With this widget you can pull your latest filckr images of your account anywhere in your website. See the sample usage below . [list style="check"]
  • Limit = The number of photos to display
  • ID = Enter Flickr id
[/list] // count = the number of images to display // id = enter flickr id number [flickr count="6" id="Flickr ID" display="random"] [/one_half] [one_half_last] [framed_box]

Flickr Photos

item.title: Buttons
item.dc:creator: aivah_system32
item.content:encoded:
Buttons

Parameters

[divider_line] [list style="arrow5 doubles" color="black"]
  • id: (id attribute) (optional)
  • class:(class attribute) (optional)
  • size: small,medium,large (optional)
  • color (optional - Available Colors see below)
  • bgcolor (optional)
  • textcolor (optional)
  • hoverbgcolor (optional)
  • hovertextcolor (optional)
  • align: center (optional)
  • full: (set full width):true,false (optional)
  • width: (optional)
  • link (link to follow when clicked) (optional)
  • linktarget: _blank,_self,_parent,_top (optional)
[/list] [divider_space]

Samples Buttons With Different Size

[button color="orange" size="small" style="false"]Small[/button] [button color="orange" size="medium" style="false"]Medium[/button] [button color="orange" size="large" style="false"]Large[/button] [ color="orange" size="small" style="false"]Small[/button] [button color="orange" size="medium" style="false"]Medium[/button] [button color="orange" size="large" style="false"]Large[/button] [divider_top]

Button With Color Variation

[button size="medium" color="black"]Black[/button] [button size="medium" color="brown"]Brown[/button] [button size="medium" color="gray"]Gray[/button] [button size="medium" color="cyan"]Cyan[/button] [button size="medium" color="orange"]Orange[/button] [button size="medium" color="red"]Red[/button] [button size="medium" color="magenta"]magenta[/button] [button size="medium" color="yellow"]Yellow[/button] [button size="medium" color="blue"]Blue[/button] [button size="medium" color="pink"]Pink[/button] [button size="medium" color="green"]Green[/button] [button size="medium" color="white"]White[/button] // Size - Three type of size as mention above // color - Different type colors as mention above [button size="medium" color="black"] Button Text [/button] [divider_top]

Buttons With Special Colors

[button color="orange" bgcolor="#ff0000" hoverbgcolor="#ff00ff" size="medium" style="false"]#000000[/button] [button color="white" textColor="#000000"]#000000[/button] // bgColor - To change the button background color // color - Different type colors as mention above // text - To change the button text color [button bgColor="#5FACA7"]#5FACA7[/button] [button color="white" textColor="#5FACA7"]#5FACA7[/button] [divider_top]

item.title: Google Charts
item.dc:creator: aivah_system32
item.content:encoded:
Google Charts Shortcode

The Google Charts is extremely simple way to create charts from some data and embed it in a website. The theme provides your Google Chart shortcode that makes the process even easier and lets create few types of charts. It is really simple to post using the shortcode.

Parameters

[divider_line] [list style="arrow5 doubles" color="black"]
  • Data
  • Title
  • Labels
  • Size
  • Color
  • Bg Color
  • Type
  • Advance
[/list] [divider_space] [fancyheading bgcolor="#969696" textcolor="#ffffff"]3D Pie Chart Title[/fancyheading] [two_third] [chart data="70,25,20.01,4.99" labels="Reffering+sites|Google|Yahoo|Other" item.title: Images
item.dc:creator: aivah_system32
item.content:encoded:
Image

Parameters
[divider_line] [list style="arrow5 doubles" color="black"]
  • Image URL
  • Image Title
  • Link URL(optional)
  • link Target (optional)
  • lightbox: true,false (optional)
  • align: left,right,center (optional)
  • width (optional)
  • height (optional)
[/list] [divider_space]

Simple image with default size

[image width="450" height="250"]Image URL[/image] [image width="250" height="250" title="Image" lightbox="false" link="#"]http://www.aivahthemes.com/victoria/files/2012/03/assets_image_11.jpg[/image] [divider_top]

Image with width and height

[image width="600" height="250"]Image URL[/image] [image width="600" height="250" title="Image" lightbox="false" link="#"]http://www.aivahthemes.com/victoria/files/2012/03/assets_image_11.jpg[/image] [divider_top]

Image with lightbox support

[image width="450" height="250" lightbox="true"]Image URL[/image] [image width="450" height="250" title="Image" lightbox="true" ]http://www.aivahthemes.com/victoria/files/2012/03/assets_image_11.jpg[/image] [divider_top]

Image with Alignment

[/tab] [/minitabs] [minitabs] [tab title="Tab 1"] Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry’s standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book. item.content:encoded:

Then enter the text for your alert boxes as seen below. Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. item.title: Widgets
item.dc:creator: aivah_system32
item.content:encoded:
[two_third]

Twitter Widget

With this widget you can pull your latest tweets from twitter account in your Website. See the sample usage below . [list style="check"]
  • count = the number of tweets to display
  • username = the twitter account you would like to pull the tweets from
[/list] // count = the number of tweets to display // username = the twitter account you would like to pull the tweets from [twitter count="2" username="sytem32store"] [/two_third] [one_third_last] [framed_box]

Follows Us

[twitter count="2" username="themeflash"] [/framed_box] [/one_third_last] [divider_top] [two_third]

Popular Posts

With this widget you can pull your Popular posts and it is calculated amount comments per post. See the sample usage below . [list style="check"]
  • count = the number of post to display
  • thumbnail = {ture or false}
[/list] // count = the number of post to display // thumbnail = {ture or false} [popularpost count="5" thumb="true"] [/two_third] [one_third_last] [framed_box]

Popular Post

[popularpost count="5" thumb="true"] [/framed_box] [/one_third_last] [divider_top] [two_third]

Recent Posts

With this widget you can pull your latest posts anywhere in your page or post or sidebar. See the sample usage below . [list style="check"]
  • count = the number of post to display
  • categories = entre id number
  • thumbnail = {ture or false}
[/list] // count = the number of post to display // categories = entre id number // thumbnail = {ture or false} [recentpost count="5" cat_id="4" thumb="true"] [/two_third] [one_third_last] [framed_box]

Recent Post

[recentpost count="3" cat_id="1" thumb="true"] [/framed_box] [/one_third_last] [divider_top] [two_third]

Contact Information

With this widget you can pull your contact information anywhere in your page or post or sidebar. See the sample usage below . // name = {your name} // address = {your street address} // state = {your state name} // city = {your city name} // zip = {your zip code} // phone = {your phone number} // email = {email address} [contactinfo name="John Doe" address="54321 Main Street." state="Victoria 8011 Australia" city="Victoria" zip="PO Box 21177" phone="+61 (0) 3 9023 0074 " email="JohnDoe(at)domain.com"] [/two_third] [one_third_last] [framed_box]

Contact Info

[contactinfo name="John Doe" address="54321 Main Street." state="Victoria 8011 Australia" city="Victoria" zip="PO Box 21177" email="JohnDoe(at)domain.com" phone="+61 (0) 3 9023 0074"] [/framed_box] [/one_third_last] [divider_top] [two_third]

Flickr Photos

With this widget you can pull your latest filckr images of your account anywhere in your website. See the sample usage below . [list style="check"]
  • Limit = The number of photos to display
  • ID = Enter Flickr id
[/list] // count = the number of images to display // id = enter flickr id number [flickr count="6" id="Flickr ID" display="random"] [/two_third] [one_third_last] [framed_box]

Flickr Photos

[flickr count="8" id="52617155@N08" display="random"] [/framed_box] [/one_third_last] [divider_top] [two_third]

Quick Contact

With this widget you can insert contact form anywhere couldn’t be easier. See the optional parameters and example usage below. [list style="check"]
  • Add contact form widget from shortcode picker
  • Enter your email address
[/list] //email= {your email address} [contactform email="king4u_7@yahoo.com" success="Enter Success Message is Editable"] [/two_third] [one_third_last] [framed_box]

Quick Contact

[contactform email="king4u_7@yahoo.com" success="Enter Success Message is Editable"] [/framed_box] [/one_third_last]
